details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.7 Unicode character maps - Valid Unicode values
details.description: The Unicode values specified in the ToUnicode CMap shall all be greater than zero (0), but not equal to either U+FEFF or U+FFFE.
